title: Donna Brazile Leaves CNN After Leaks Reveal Campaign Collusion
subtitle: CNN parted ways with political commentator Donna Brazile after leaked e-mails demonstrated what appeared to be improper collusion with Hillary Clinton's campaign.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donna Brazile was fired from CNN after leaked e-mails suggested she used her position to pass information to the Clinton campaign about upcoming appearances.
